body_html:
We have dropped support for Mac-GPU setups, starting with 1.2 release.
But your problem is caused by mismatch in cuDNN versions.

All TF binaries are built with cuDNN 5 support.
For use with cuDNN 6, you will need to build from sources.
body_text:
We have dropped support for Mac-GPU setups, starting with 1.2 release.
But your problem is caused by mismatch in cuDNN versions.
All TF binaries are built with cuDNN 5 support.
For use with cuDNN 6, you will need to build from sources.
body:
We have dropped support for Mac-GPU setups, starting with 1.2 release.
But your problem is caused by mismatch in cuDNN versions.

All TF binaries are built with cuDNN 5 support.
For use with cuDNN 6, you will need to build from sources.
